application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: T.1 Cedar - Reshape to reduce overeexended limbs to suitable growth points in line with main crown shape & deadwood (TPO).T.2 Horn Beam - 2m Reduction in height to suitable growth points shaping into lower crown sympathetically, crown lift to provide 3m clearance from ground level (driveway) and remove any deadwood (TCA).T.3 Arbutus - Fell (TPO poor health).T.4 Magnolia - Fell (TPO Dying).G.2 H.1 Cypress Hedge - Fell first 2 trees & trim remainder to shape (exempt).G.3 Mixed Shrubs and Cypress - Fell (TCA).G.4 Mixed Shrubs and Saplings - Fell (TCA).
